title: dimonstration
author: dimonstration
content: I’m playing same set of games on different casino not just to get the bonuses of each casino but also to have a different mood of my mind set. It really helps me to calm down and focus whenever I’m losing big time on one casino. It also helps me to not chase my previous losses because I think about it as fresh start.With this regular routine, I notice that I have a specific casino that I’m always winning despite I’m playing same game that I lose huge amount on the other casino. I do randomly change the sequence of my game on casino and keeps giving me same good result on my personal lucky casino. I highly believe that this luck of mine related on how I feel when playing on that casino. I’m expecting that I will be lucky so my mind is always optimistic whenever I’m playing on it.Do you have this kind of casino?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on November 17, 2022, 11:51:55 AMWith this regular routine, I notice that I have a specific casino that I’m always winning despite I’m playing same game that I lose huge amount on the other casino. I do randomly change the sequence of my game on casino and keeps giving me same good result on my personal lucky casino. I highly believe that this luck of mine related on how I feel when playing on that casino. I’m expecting that I will be lucky so my mind is always optimistic whenever I’m playing on it.Mine that I noticed was in trading, I do not noticed this while gambling, but I noticed it while trading, that I lose more on Binace while winning on OKX, there was even a time I won some amount daily for over 3 weeks on OKX and I told someone about it that when I trade on Binace I do lose, I moved the money to Binace to trade and I lost all in just 3 days, this happen few months ago. But the more I learn, the better I know, presently I trade on both exchanges and I win than lose which makes me think it is just my believe and not reality. In gambling, I have not experienced this, the luck I have in one gambling site is what I have on another too, I remember when I use to lose more while gambling, I lost money similarly on each gambling sites. When I decided to reduce my betting, take it for what it is, I still have more win, but if low amount, but which is similar on all the gambling sites that I am using.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: It seems that I have never or have not realized about it, what I remember is that I mostly make withdrawals at one of the casinos where I play because indeed my gambling activities are mostly done there, maybe what you experience is just a coincidence or you play games that are HE at every casino it's different so you experience that you win more at other casinos than the other one.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Well it's just your belief or your mind to think x casino is really lucky for you, y is a unlucky casino, z casino is the combination of x and y etc. Any casino has a same provider, has a same game and also a same RTP, there's no way the outcome is different. You're playing because of the trustworthiness from the provider, it's not because of the casino. Casino only include the games and they're not doing anything to control the game.

I’m expecting that I will be lucky so my mind is always optimistic whenever I’m playing on it.Do you have this kind of casino?I have one casino that I consider my lucky casino not because I always win but because this is where I won my biggest winning you will always mark casinos where you win huge than casinos where you often won but not a big amount, we should always optimistic on all the casinos where we are playing if that will bring us luck, what's the use of playing in a casino that you are not optimistic, you will waste your time, either you play with optimism on a casino or do not play at if you don't believe that you are going to win, it's better to treat all casinos as the same.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on November 17, 2022, 11:51:55 AMI’m playing same set of games on different casino not just to get the bonuses of each casino but also to have a different mood of my mind set. I’m expecting that I will be lucky so my mind is always optimistic whenever I’m playing on it.Do you have this kind of casino? - This is just proof that every win of a gambler in crypto gambling always based on the luck of a player. But according to my experience, every game I played I have never experienced getting the bonus in a game.But I also have a friend here in crypto gambling who seems to have the same experience as you dude, maybe the only difference between you is that when he plays a game and gets the bonus or jackpot he does it after 2 weeks again before he plays the games again that, and he will choose a different game to play the next day. Although he also tells me that he often loses playing games and that it's just luck.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Betfury is my lucky casino I win a lot in this casino even though its a small amount and I am making a residual income by staking my BFG tokens that I bought last year, and I'm lucky to be part of the signature campaign so that means I can stake all the coins that I accumulate in the signature campaign and I'm planning to do that after the campaign, I'm sure I'm not the only who considered Betfury casino as their lucky casino.

I’m expecting that I will be lucky so my mind is always optimistic whenever I’m playing on it.Do you have this kind of casino?It is just a coincidence and I doubt it will go on for a long period of time so don't overdo it and quit while you can before becoming completely addicted.I am always optimistic every time I start a session in my favorite slot machine and it does not matter at all at which casino I am playing,what I know is that the end result in 99.99% of the times is not something that I should be optimistic at and that is why I am largely thinking to start betting on sport betting on weekends only rather than continuing to play in midweek in slot machines.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Coincidence I guess. I'd only say you are lucky with that casino if you hit jacpots multiple times. Winning is part of the game and since you've mentioned that you are moving platforms one after another, maybe it just happens that your winnings occur in that gambling site. But eitherway, whether lucky or not, try to test it. Play continuously on that site and see it for yourself. If it is not true that your luck is on that platform, then it is for you to decide whether you'll still play on their house. More likely there are other factors which will make you stay on it such as players, offers, and the likes. I was before having a routine like that until I found mine, at the present. Even if other platforms has bigger bonuses, I'm good with mine.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: Yatsan on November 17, 2022, 01:31:14 PMCoincidence I guess. I'd only say you are lucky with that casino if you hit jacpots multiple times. Winning is part of the game and since you've mentioned that you are moving platforms one after another, maybe it just happens that your winnings occur in that gambling site. But eitherway, whether lucky or not, try to test it. Play continuously on that site and see it for yourself. If it is not true that your luck is on that platform, then it is for you to decide whether you'll still play on their house. More likely there are other factors which will make you stay on it such as players, offers, and the likes. I was before having a routine like that until I found mine, at the present. Even if other platforms has bigger bonuses, I'm good with mine.Actually, I tested it many times for over a year. I have 70% to 80% win chance rate on my lucky casino based on my deposit and withdraw history compared to my other casino account that has negative profit. I always deposit fixed amount in each casino that I play so that I can track my profit. Of course, this is just my personal belief since there is no way to measure luck or to prove it except for the positive result. I’m also a casino player that playing with bonus consideration that is why I play on multiple casino. This just lucky casino of mine is just my personal assumption based on my experience.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on November 17, 2022, 11:51:55 AMDo you have this kind of casino?I have made a conclusion for a long time and the decision I have made has been one year now, for now I only use two online casino gambling sites in this forum, of course I made that decision because I have tried it like you have experienced in different casinos, I was on a losing streak, different in the two casinos i mean luck.What is certain is that for now I have found and have Lucky casino for me, where I don't need to deposit a lot of money at my lucky casino, I just have to bet the remaining balance and bonuses and I can make money, The game that I often get the most luck is soccer betting, sometimes slots, obviously I have a casino like you experience.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: I think gamblers who like to play in several casinos must feel like what OP experienced. when we are more often at 1 casino, of course, we can't compare it to the experience at other casinos.I don't have much experience playing in some casinos. Currently, the most routine I play is only 1 casino. and some are new casinos. whether it's luck or not, in a new casino I usually get more wins, unfortunately, it's with a small capital to just get experience with a new casino.

I do randomly change the sequence of my game on casino and keeps giving me same good result on my personal lucky casino. I highly believe that this luck of mine related on how I feel when playing on that casino. I’m expecting that I will be lucky so my mind is always optimistic whenever I’m playing on it.Do you have this kind of casino?We all have one or two casinos that get our priority or are considered our lucky casino and it may not be a casino where we won a big amount or always win, but a casino where it has all the games and the features that we want to enjoy the game, and a casino that we can always recommend to our friend to play because it's not only a popular casino but a reputable we are comfortable playing here and at the same time have confidence in recommending it.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: actually the key is for ourselves to control how we play wiser of course the feeling must be in a happy state not when we are emotional, every feeling and self-control that we play of course it can also bring luck regardless of which casino you want to play at, but to be honest the casino won't let you win a lot of money either, so play wisely and don't be greedy even if you only win a little at least you are consistent that's more than enough

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I don't think I own a casino of this kind, as I move between them from time to time. And I also play different slot games, depending on the mood I have at the time. But I didn't get much luck doing that because I just wanted to play gambling without thinking about winning and just wanted to spend my free time. Maybe once or twice, I can get a win but it's not as big as losing the money I got But that's okay because my goal in gambling is to have fun. Sometimes there are thoughts about why I can't win more money but I know it's because of the luck factor that doesn't come my way.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Not exactly lucky casino, but I understand what you are saying and I have had a similar experience. When playing slots or roulette and haven't won a significant prize for a long time, changing games and feeling what you say:Quote from: dimonstration on November 17, 2022, 11:51:55 AM<...> I think about it as fresh start.It has happened to me on a few occasions when switching that I hit a jackpot, which you can put down to luck when switching, but it's pure chance. Maybe you would have stayed in the same game or in the same casino and hit the jackpot anyway, which you can't know.

comments.author: redsun114
comments.body: You cannot say that you are playing the same set of games to get the bonus because each casino has a different rules when it comes to bonus system and some of them will only let you play on specific games which wagering is hard to do but it's true that switching on different casino can change our mood. We can feel excited, and it removes our boredom that we feel from sticking on the same casino for a long period of time.The only thing I differ from you is that I still count my previous losses and combined them all together. If you think you are lucky on some casinos then you better stick on it forever. There is no need to waste your capital on the other but you can just bet on it right away on your lucky casino and then win immediately.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: I only use a single casino, stake.com and I confess that in the last few days I have lost and I haven't won anything, but that doesn't mean that it's because of the casino, I lose because I make mistakes in the analysis of the game, that's because the games I'm betting on are games that don't have much information on google, so betting like that results in losing money but that's something normal, I don't use many casinos, but there was a time when I used 3 casinos and strangely I always lost in duelbits, I even got giving up using duelbits, it was so bad luck that I won nothing, at sportsbet.io I also just lost, every day I lost my bets and gave up using the siteQuote from: Don Pedro Dinero on November 17, 2022, 03:08:43 PMNot exactly lucky casino, but I understand what you are saying and I have had a similar experience.no one is blaming the casinos, we are talking about not having luck in a certain casino, of course people with a lot of skill can do well in any casino without problems, perhaps the only problem that these people could have would be related to withdrawals, something like casino withhold their withdrawal, but in the matter of winning, they would do well if they are very skilled

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I have never thought of it that way. The difference between the two different casinos can be a restart for your luck now and your attitude with the current happenings in the casino. It will be an excellent way to approach how you can manage your temper and emotions when gambling, but it wouldn't help you control yourself so that you can ignore and stop playing first and recover the money you lost. The disadvantage would be the part where you are interested in gambling more, and you can lose more by playing with more casinos.

comments.author: AicecreaME
comments.body: Quote from: crwth on November 17, 2022, 03:26:22 PMI have never thought of it that way. The difference between the two different casinos can be a restart for your luck now and your attitude with the current happenings in the casino. It will be an excellent way to approach how you can manage your temper and emotions when gambling, but it wouldn't help you control yourself so that you can ignore and stop playing first and recover the money you lost. The disadvantage would be the part where you are interested in gambling more, and you can lose more by playing with more casinos. It isn't really because of the casino for me. Although if you believe in such, there's also no harm. Maybe some of us really have that kind of "lucky" places and such. Perhaps we attract some form of charm if we believe in it. However, I think it's more of your mental state and your determination to win the game. If you are not in the right mental headspace and if the odds are not just on your favor, then expect losses. Winning is a combination of luck and calculated probability after all. Just be mindful of your gambling habits. Still always play responsibly despite winning or losing after several attempts.
